nodes.text: The Scofti government of the was active in the Unknown Regions. Scofti leadership underwent frequent changes in leaders and governmental regimes with transitions being often violent, or motivated by the threat of violence. New Scofti leaders would then reorganize their palace, often taking pleasure in destroying the items of their predecessor. As such, Scofti artisans made such items intentionally fragile. At some point in their history, the Scofti government entered into marginal contact with the Chiss Ascendancy.
